attributes.action: recognise the England women's cricket team's achievements with formal honours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The England women's cricket team deserve recognition for their World Twenty20 win, which comes three months after their World Cup victory. They are the best side in the world and should be recognised for their achievements, both as top-class sportspeople and as excellent role models.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
